item.title: 州财政部长对马斯克不重视特斯拉表示担忧
item.description: 鉴于特斯拉在地区产业、创新和就业方面的重要性，美国七个州的财务主管对特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）缺乏对电动汽车制造商的重视表示担忧。【原文：Treasurers of seven U.S. states have raised concerns about Tesla CEO Elon Musk's lack of focus on the electric vehicle maker, given its significance in regional industries, innovation and employment.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国财政部长称与中国的关系难以为继
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士称，美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特周二表示，与中国的关税对峙不可持续，他预计局势将缓和。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Tuesday said that the tariff standoff with China is unsustainable and that he expects the situation to de-escalate, a source familiar said.】

item.title: 谷歌选择不对第三方 cookie 进行独立提示
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周二表示，它将不会推出针对第三方 cookie 的新的独立提示，并将保留 Chrome 浏览器中的小代码包。【原文：Alphabet's Google said on Tuesday it will not be rolling out a new standalone prompt for third-party cookies and will retain the tiny packets of code in its Chrome browser.】

item.title: 特斯拉空头今年增加 115 亿美元，定位看跌
item.description: 根据 S3 Partners 的最新报告，特斯拉的卖空者今年迄今估计增加了 115 亿美元，而且在这家电动汽车制造商将于收盘后发布季度财报之前，卖空者的定位是看跌。【原文：Tesla short sellers are up an estimated $11.5 billion for the year-to-date and positioning is bearish going into the electric vehicle maker's quarterly results due after market close, according to the latest report from S3 Partners.】

item.title: 彭博社报道：贝森特表示美国愿意为阿根廷提供信贷额度
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，如果全球冲击危及阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）的经济转机，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府将愿意向阿根廷政府提供特定的信贷额度。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration would be willing to offer Argentina’s government a specific credit line if a global shock jeopardized President Javier Milei’s economic turnaround, according to Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent's comments reported by Bloomberg News on Tuesday.】

item.title: 尽管特朗普加征关税，美国国防承包商大多维持预期
item.description: 美国主要国防承包商大多维持对2025年的财务预测，称现在了解美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税影响还为时过早。【原文：Major U.S. defense contractors are mostly maintaining their financial forecasts for 2025, saying it is too soon to understand the impact of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs.】

item.title: 迪拜杜宣布与微软达成 20 亿迪拉姆超大规模数据中心协议
item.description: 阿联酋综合电信公司（du）周二宣布与微软公司（Microsoft .NET）达成一项价值 20 亿迪拉姆（5.4454 亿美元）的超大规模数据中心协议。【原文：The Emirates Integrated Telecommunications Company PJSC (du) on Tuesday announced a 2 billion dirhams ($544.54 million) hyperscale data center deal with Microsoft .】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）首席经济学家在被问及特朗普对鲍威尔的攻击时表示，央行必须保持独立性
item.description: 周二，国际货币基金组织（IMF）首席经济学家在被问及美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的攻击时强调，必须维护中央银行的独立性，以保持其在对抗通胀方面的公信力。【原文：The IMF's chief economist, asked on Tuesday about U.S. President Donald Trump's attacks on Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, underlined the importance of preserving the independence of central banks to maintain their credibility in fighting inflation.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称贸易动荡导致金融稳定风险大幅上升
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周二警告说，自今年秋季以来，全球金融稳定风险显著增加，主要原因是贸易政策和其他地缘政治因素导致经济不确定性增加。【原文：Global financial stability risks have increased significantly since the fall, driven largely by heightened economic uncertainty around trade policy and other geopolitical factors, the International Monetary Fund cautioned Tuesday.】

item.title: 希腊酸奶制造商 Chobani 将投资 12 亿美元在纽约建厂
item.description: 希腊酸奶生产商 Chobani 周二表示，将投资 12 亿美元在纽约建设其在美国的第三家乳品加工厂，预计将创造 1000 多个全职工作岗位。【原文：Greek-yogurt maker Chobani said on Tuesday that it would be investing $1.2 billion in building its third U.S. dairy processing plant in New York, and expects to create more than 1,000 full-time jobs.】

item.title: Temenos 公布第一季度核心盈利略高于预期，并宣布回购股票
item.description: 银行软件公司 Temenos 周二表示，除去正在出售的 Multifonds 业务，该公司第一季度的备考核心盈利为 6950 万美元，略高于分析师的预期。【原文：Banking software company Temenos said on Tuesday that it achieved proforma core earnings of $69.5 million in its first quarter excluding its Multifonds business which is being sold, slightly above analysts' consensus.】

item.title: 埃利奥特增持英国石油公司股份至略高于 5
item.description: 根据周二发布的监管公告，激进对冲基金埃利奥特持有英国石油公司 5.006% 的投票权，超过了要求报告英国公司大股东持股情况的门槛。【原文：Activist hedge fund Elliott holds 5.006% of voting rights in BP , according to a regulatory notice published on Tuesday, crossing the threshold that requires reporting of big shareholdings in British companies.】

item.title: 意大利称 UniCredit-BPM 合作条款避免帮助俄罗斯
item.description: 路透社看到的一项法令显示，意大利认为有必要在批准联合信贷银行（UniCredit）对 Banco BPM 的竞购前设定有约束力的条件，以避免 "哪怕是最微小的风险"，从而帮助联合信贷银行开展业务的俄罗斯经济。【原文：Italy deemed it necessary to set binding conditions before clearing UniCredit's proposed bid for Banco BPM to avoid "even the slightest risk" of aiding Russia's economy where UniCredit operates, a decree seen by Reuters showed.】

item.title: 通用电气航空航天集团首席执行官库尔普倡导航空业实行免关税制度
item.description: 通用电气航空航天集团首席执行官拉里-卡尔普（Larry Culp）周二表示，他在与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）会面时，主张根据 1979 年《民用飞机协议》重建航空航天工业免关税制度。【原文：GE Aerospace CEO Larry Culp said on Tuesday he advocated re-establishing a tariff-free regime for the aerospace industry under the 1979 Civil Aircraft Agreement when he met with U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 黄金再创新高；市场突破 3500 美元/盎司
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普再次抨击美联储主席之后，市场对美国经济的信心进一步削弱，黄金的大幅上涨达到了新的高度，触及每盎司 3500 美元。【原文：Gold's remarkable run higher is reaching new heights, with the market touching $3,500 per ounce as confidence in the U.S. economy further erodes after President Donald Trump's renewed attack on the Federal Reserve chair.】

item.title: 美国银行股东确定高管薪酬，选举董事
item.description: 美国银行股东周二投票通过了首席执行官布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）和该银行高管的薪酬方案，并选举了董事会的 14 名董事。【原文：Bank of America shareholders voted on Tuesday to approve pay packages for CEO Brian Moynihan and the lender's top executives, and also elected its 14 directors on the board.】

item.title: 谷歌考虑与安卓制造商签订双子座人工智能独家协议
item.description: 据反垄断审判第二天出示的一份文件显示，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌去年曾考虑与三星等安卓手机制造商达成交易，不仅为其搜索应用提供独家代理权，还为其双子座人工智能应用和 Chrome 浏览器提供独家代理权。【原文：Alphabet's Google contemplated deals with Android phone makers such as Samsung last year that would provide exclusivity for not only its search app, but also for its Gemini AI app and Chrome browser, according to a document shown at the second day of an antitrust trial.】

item.title: 花旗称美国经济衰退几率接近 45%，关税的最大影响将出现在下半年
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup）首席经济学家内森-谢茨（Nathan Sheets）周二表示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对中国和其他贸易伙伴征收关税的影响，美国经济出现衰退的几率为 40% 至 45%。【原文：Citigroup's Chief Economist Nathan Sheets said on Tuesday the U.S. has a 40% to 45% chance of recession as the economy suffers the impact of tariffs imposed by president Donald Trump on China and other trading partners.】

item.title: 独家报道文件显示，俄罗斯将 2025 年能源出口收入预期下调 15
item.description: 路透社看到的一份经济部文件显示，由于油价疲软，俄罗斯下调了对 2025-2027 年石油和天然气出口收入的预测，今年的石油和天然气出口收入将下降 15%，而石油和天然气出口收入是国家预算的主要资金来源。【原文：Russia has cut its forecast for 2025-2027 oil and gas export revenues, a key source of funding for the state budget, due to weaker oil prices, seeing the proceeds falling by 15% this year, according to an economy ministry document seen by Reuters.】

item.title: NVR 季度利润下降，原因是房价疲软打击了利润率
item.description: NVR 周二公布的第一季度利润下降了 24%，原因是房屋建筑商的利润率受到了地段成本上升和住房需求疲软带来的定价压力的打击。【原文：NVR on Tuesday posted a 24% fall in first-quarter profit, as the homebuilder's margins were hit by higher lot costs and pricing pressure amid weak housing demand.】

item.title: 独家："中国轨迹 "银行净额结算系统保护中俄贸易不被西方盯上
item.description: 银行业消息人士告诉路透社，俄罗斯主要银行已经为与中国的交易建立了一个被称为 "中国轨道 "的净额支付系统，目的是降低西方监管机构对这些交易的关注度，减少二次制裁的风险。【原文：Major Russian banks have set up a netting payments system dubbed "The China Track" for transactions with China, aiming to reduce their visibility to Western regulators and mitigate the risk of secondary sanctions, banking sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 大众汽车集团携新车型和内部辅助驾驶系统重返中国市场
item.description: 本周二，大众汽车集团在上海展示了为中国开发的五款新车型和一套内部辅助驾驶系统，以期在竞争激烈的中国市场重新赢得份额。【原文：Volkswagen Group showcased five new models developed for China and an in-house assisted driving system on Tuesday in Shanghai as it fights to win back share in the fiercely competitive market.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称，人工智能带来的经济收益可能超过排放成本
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周二表示，人工智能带来的经济收益将在2025年至2030年间使全球产出每年提高约0.5%，超过运行人工智能模型所需的数据中心碳排放增加所带来的成本。【原文：Economic gains from artificial intelligence will boost global output by around 0.5% a year between 2025 and 2030, outweighing the costs of rising carbon emissions by the data centres needed to run AI models, the International Monetary Fund said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织下调日本经济增长预期，原因是特朗普征收关税
item.description: 国际货币基金组织周二下调了对日本经济增长的预测，并预计受美国提高关税的影响，日本央行的加息步伐将慢于预期。【原文：The International Monetary Fund on Tuesday cut its economic growth forecast for Japan and projected the central bank would lift interest rates at a slower-than-expected pace due to the impact of higher U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 美联储哈克称美国贫困水平可能被低估
item.description: 费城联邦储备银行行长帕特里克-哈克（Patrick Harker）周二表示，美国的真实贫困水平可能被低估了，他的评论并未涉及货币政策和经济前景。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia President Patrick Harker said on Tuesday the true level of poverty in the United States might be understated, in comments that did not address the monetary policy and economic outlook.】

item.title: 英国食品和服装集团 M&S 披露网络事件
item.description: 英国玛莎百货公司（Marks & Spencer）周二表示，该公司在过去几天里一直在处理一起网络事件，并对其商店的运营进行了一些临时调整。【原文：Britain's Marks & Spencer said on Tuesday it has been managing a cyber incident over the past few days, and had made some temporary changes to its store operations.】

item.title: 波音将以 105.5 亿美元向 Thoma Bravo 出售部分数字航空解决方案业务
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，将以 105.5 亿美元的价格向私募股权公司 Thoma Bravo 出售其数字航空解决方案业务的一部分。【原文：Boeing said on Tuesday it will sell portions of its Digital Aviation Solutions business to private equity firm Thoma Bravo for $10.55 billion.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称，随着经济增长放缓，新兴经济体面临资金收紧的考验
item.description: 国际货币基金组织周二下调了包括墨西哥和中国在内的新兴经济体2025年的增长前景，并警告说，融资条件的收紧和发展现金的匮乏可能会给发展中国家带来痛苦。【原文：The International Monetary Fund on Tuesday cut its 2025 growth outlook for emerging economies including Mexico and China, warning that tighter funding conditions and a scarcity of development cash could inflict pain on developing nations.】

item.title: T-Mobile 的 Metro 推出价格更低的预付费计划，价格锁定 5 年
item.description: T-Mobile 的预付费部门周二发布了四项新计划，提供五年价格保证，每条线路的月费低至 25 美元，在经济不确定的情况下，该公司试图保护其市场份额不受竞争影响。【原文：T-Mobile's prepaid unit unveiled four new plans on Tuesday that provide a five-year price guarantee and monthly charges as low as $25 per line, as the company seeks to shield its market share from competition amid economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 美国征收百年来最高关税，国际货币基金组织下调多数国家经济增长预期
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周二下调了对美国、中国和大多数国家经济增长的预测，理由是美国关税的影响现已达到百年新高，并警告说进一步的贸易紧张局势将使经济增长进一步放缓。【原文：The International Monetary Fund on Tuesday slashed its forecasts for growth in the United States, China and most countries, citing the impact of U.S. tariffs now at 100-year highs, and warning that further trade tensions would slow growth further.】
